alert.note: Alert for Benton; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Benton and south central Morrison Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Little Falls, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Royalton around 305 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rice. This includes U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 151 and 164. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
